reviews.review_msg: She seems like a nice professor, however, she is not very engaging when teaching. She would teach for about an hour out of a three hour class, wth the remaining two hours of the class consist of watching a film. Also, the class was mostly guest lectures. If possible, take ARCH 375 with another prof, I would NOT recommend this class.
Boring and uninformative lectures as she simply reads her slides and does not give feedbacks on tour assignments. Would never take a course with her again.
I highly recommend Rob. If you are at school to learn and you want credit for all the effort you put in, you should definitly take classes with Rob.
On eof the best profs in the arcaheology department
